sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Link Button">dbcc1afd2f353010b14c5fd62799b6c6</child><cloned>2021-08-06 21:16:15</cloned><last_validated>2021-08-06 21:16:15</last_validated><parent display_value="link-button">abc50de6d702120023c84f80de61036a</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>standard</category><client_script/><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.btn {
  width: 100%;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data>{
	"href": "www.google.com",
	"button_text": "Go to google"
}</demo_data><description/><docs/><field_list>color</field_list><has_preview>true</has_preview><id>widget-link-button</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>link-button</name><option_schema>[{"name":"href","section":"Presentation","label":"Link for button","type":"string"},{"name":"button_text","section":"Presentation","label":"Contents of button","type":"string"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles>snc_external,snc_internal</roles><script><![CDATA[data.buttonMsg = gs.getMessage(options.button_text || "Click Here");
data.socialQAEnabled = true;
data.canReadKnowledgeBase = true;
if (options.href == "?id=sqanda_new_question") {
	data.socialQAEnabled = gs.getProperty('glide.sp.socialqa.enabled') === 'true';
	data.knowledgeBase = $sp.getPortalRecord().getValue("sqanda_knowledge_base") || gs.getProperty("glide.service_portal.sqanda.default_kb");
	data.canReadKnowledgeBase = $sp.canReadRecord("kb_knowledge_base", data.knowledgeBase);
}]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-11 23:15:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>abc50de6d702120023c84f80de61036a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>56</sys_mod_count><sys_name>link-button</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">50f2458f6d6620100acb70b353433062</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_abc50de6d702120023c84f80de61036a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-11 07:44:53</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<a ng-href="{{options.href}}" class="btn btn-{{options.color}} m-b" ng-if="data.socialQAEnabled && data.canReadKnowledgeBase">{{data.buttonMsg}}</a>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-06 21:16:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>ebcc1afd2f353010b14c5fd62799b6c9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dbcc1afd2f353010b14c5fd62799b6c6</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Training Tracker" source="x_167994_training">b9a77c3c2f1130101caaff1df699b687</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Training Tracker">b9a77c3c2f1130101caaff1df699b687</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_ebcc1afd2f353010b14c5fd62799b6c9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-06 21:16:15</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
